name: Nischith B O
title: QA Automation Engineer | Java, Python | 4+ Years Experience
summary: Results-driven SDET with 4+ years of experience in test automation, CI/CD, and performance testing. Skilled in Java, Python, Selenium, Jenkins, and cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP). Specializes in building scalable automation frameworks, optimizing cloud resources, and enhancing CI/CD pipeline efficiency. Passionate about delivering high-quality software through automation and DevOps practices, and seeking opportunities to drive innovation and continuous improvement in automation workflows.
